title: How can I hide text preview without stopping the notification?
content:
Hi guys, I am a new Pixel 3XL user. This is my first device from the Pixel family. I was wondering if I could stop getting the preview of a text message without stopping the notification. I want to be notified of a new text, but I just want the preview to be hidden.
Thank you.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
